word_mean: 龟头炎，阴茎头炎：常见于包茎

PerfectNetExp.abs: 龟头炎(balanitis)指龟头黏膜的炎症，而包皮炎指包皮及其黏膜面的炎症。临床上，两者常同时存在，统称为龟头包皮炎(bala.

list.abs: 糜烂性龟头炎 balanitis erosiva
淋菌性亀头炎：balanoblennorrhea淋菌性亀头炎：gonorrheal balanitis淋菌性亀头炎：gonorrheal balanoposthitis
3.念珠菌性龟头炎(candidal balanitis) 念珠菌性龟头炎可为原发性，也可为继发性。后者常继发于糖尿病患者，老年消耗性疾病及抗生素和激素治疗之.
gangrene 坏疽gangrenous balanitis 坏疽性龟头炎gangrenous stomatitis 坏疽性口炎

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Greek balanos 'glans penis' (literally 'acorn') + -itis

means.word_mean: 1. inflammation of the head of the penis

auth_sentence.content: This condition is also known as balanitis xerotica obliterans and it is seen almost exclusively in uncircumcised men and boys.
auth_sentence.res_content: This condition is also known as balanitis xerotica obliterans and it is seen almost exclusively in uncircumcised men and boys.
